name: The Banisher (BETA)
description:
The Banisher is an in development first person horror game, told from the perspective of Samson Kelley, a demon hunter. Eventually, you will be able to play your way through 3 levels, at roughly 30 minutes of gameplay each. Currently only the first level is fully completed, but the map for the second level is included for exploration purposes.

Explore a haunted mansion to exorcise possessed objects while avoiding a vicious Hell Crawler. Survive a night in a national park, repairing your broken vehicle while being relentlessly hunted by Hellhounds. Scramble for your life in a decrepit city as you attempt to close a portal to Hell itself. Can you stay alive and bring a close to the demonic happenings?

This game is our first title and our first experience into serious video game development. Ignis Inferni Games is a two man team of high school seniors, so a consistent update schedule cannot be promised, however this game is in active development and greatly appreciates community feedback. In that regard, we encourage you to fill out the beta reflection at: 

https://goo.gl/forms/mqI67gtrW6FdDsMw2

We are aware that this game is likely riddled with bugs in its current state but with your help, we hope to squash them and turn this game into something truly great! Once complete, the game will be posted both here and on Steam for $1.99.

Happy banishing!

- The Ignis Inferni Games Team
